name: Power to the People (Winter Fairy)
description:
In 'Power to the People' you embody a revolutionary ghost who's task it is to ignite the flame of resistance in the hearts of the people. March against the oppressors of  this dystopian society and use the power of unity to cure the pervasive social maladies of the world.
Encounter greedy bankers, shifty energy tycoons and megalomaniacal gun lobbyists and bring back the power to the people!
